amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the midnight rules moratorium any rule that has been included in the Unified Regulatory Agenda for at least one year.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 114-666 to exempt from the midnight rules moratorium any rule that has been included in the Unified Regulatory Agenda for at least one year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watson Coleman amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 243 (Roll no. 374).

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Watson Coleman.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
